Identity.History: The United States of America are a federal republic in north america, that has the biggest (in terms of cost intensity) or second biggest (in terms of the number of members) army and the largest gross domestic product in the world. Independent since 1776, the nation grew quickly to one of the most influential of america and, at latest since the end of WWII, of the world. As one of the founding members of the North Atlantic Treaty Organization "NATO", it was the only member who had ever invoked the casus foederis, namely after the September 11 attacks in 2001
